title: Nike AG
imageCaption: CREATIVE DIRECTION / IDENTITY / ART DIRECTION / DESIGN
description: Imagining a new Nike product line titled Anti-Gravity.
richtext:
This brand experience is rooted in the space-age materials utilized to improve performance. "Lift Your Expectations" communicates the benefits of the new line and associated materials. These images illustrate omni-channel activation.
